import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, DropdownButton, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap'; export class Header extends Component { state = { aboutShown: false, area: "NSW" } showAbout = (shown) => { this.setState({ aboutShown: !this.state.aboutShown }) } render() { return ( <>

Activities in Sydney

#AustraliaLockdown

{this.selectArea}} id="dropdown-basic-button" title="Select Area"> Australia New South Wales {/* New South Wales Victoria Queensland Western Australia South Australia Australian Capital Territory Northern Territory */}
Activities in {this.state.area} #AustraliaLockdown

This map shows popular activities in Sydney during #LockdownAustralia based on Twitter data.

This application is developed for Cluster and Cloud Computing assigment 2 Semester 1 2020 by

  • klastanto@student.unimelb.edu.au
  • mchaerudin@student.unimelb.edu.au
  • sanisuzzaman@student.unimelb.edu.au
  • devinvinun@student.unimelb.edu.au
  • abhisheka@student.unimelb.edu.au
Credits:
  • Map provider: OpenStreetMap by OpenStreetMap contributors
  • Data provider: Twitter, AURIN
  • Icons provider: Fontawesome (CC BY 4.0 License)
 ) } } export default Header;
